professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in Informix and PostgreSQL. Skilled in database management, administration, and development. Proven track record in troubleshooting, system optimization, and project implementation.

key_responsibilities: Maintain and administrate numerous Informix instances containing production and development databases.
Work with a third-party help desk to troubleshoot and correct database issues.
Collaborate with System Administrators to ensure storage and replication needs are met.
Setup and manage a small office of PCs and peripherals.
Work with vendors to manage phone and network capabilities.
Assist staff in troubleshooting and teaching new technologies.
Maintain and administrate 42 Informix instances with 1-5 databases each.
Maintain and administrate 6 PostgreSQL databases with multiple schemas within each.
Diagnose and repair computers and consumer electronics.
Establish data protection systems for customer privacy.
Develop procedures to increase customer satisfaction.
